title: Maximising Personal Productivity
headline: Learn how to maximise your time and personal efficiency to achieve optimal productivity with this free online course.
description: Do you ever need more time during the day to get everything done? You are certainly not alone. This course teaches you how to organise your life and uncovers additional tools for optimal productivity. Study how to set ‘SMART’ goals, develop daily routines, schedule tasks, create a practical workspace and tackle procrastination. Start this course today and learn skills to manage your time and achieve your desired goals.
courseDescription:
Everyone wants to succeed but we all have limited time to achieve our goals. This course will teach you how to manage your life effectively and find extra moments to get more done. Setting goals is one of the vital life skills that most people never learn to do correctly. We will show you how to set and prioritise your dreams using the ‘Three Ps’ theory and the ‘SMART’ method. You will also learn how to establish a routine and schedule your tasks and activities in the most efficient way possible.

Even if you have a plan in place, it is essential to keep adjusting your plans to stay in control of your time. We will discuss techniques to help you handle new tasks and stay on top of your to-do list. You will also be introduced to essential project management techniques and concepts and learn how to use them to become more productive. Discover some ideas for creating an effective, ergonomic workspace in any office.

In the concluding section, you will explore ways to keep your paper and electronic files organised and examine some tools to manage your email time. Additionally, you will learn how to overcome procrastination and tackle the critical actions that have the most significant positive impact on your life. The publisher of this course, John Academy, is a company which strives to provide learners with the practical knowledge and transferable skills they need to advance in their careers. So enrol with Alison today and learn how to balance your life to achieve your goals.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
